author: marinakolosova
body:
- Renamed fully hadronic paths BTagCSV, DoubleBTagCSV, TripleBTagCSV and DeepCSV as in https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-1463.
- Added jetEtaBinning for PFJetFwd paths.
- Some updates on the selection/binning of the fully hadronic paths.
- Fixed a histo label in TopMonitor.cc
title: Path renaming and some updates for TOP and BTV
